channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- Kubevirt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- Kubevirt

item.title: CVE-2022-1798|2024-08-03T00:17:00.704Z -- google%20llc -- kubevirt
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in KubeVirt versions up to 0.56 (and 0.55.1) on all platforms allows a user able to configure the kubevirt to read arbitrary files on the host filesystem which are publicly readable or which are readable for UID 107 or GID 107. /proc/self/<> is not accessible.
